title: MatchWiser
description:
Hiring is complicated for both sides. 

Mental functions determine how we gather information and make decisions.  Determining this is a non-deterministic problem. Humans are too complex. 

 MatchWiser is capable of assessing the best-fitting mental functions for any task (data gathering and decision-making). Similar can be attempted for the people and a natural fit becomes the starting point for hiring.

Enter a job description and candidate files. Read the assessment and you are all set.
